name: kaftan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, loose piece of clothing with wide sleeves, of the type worn in Western Asia: A man in a velvet kaftan greeted them.
lianglow/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a loose, usually long dress made of thin material, sometimes worn over a swimming costume at the beach: They sell bikinis, sarongs, kaftans and other beach basics. The shortie kaftan is for the beach and the pool, yet also for lunch and cocktails in the shade.
